cosmic_conquistadors

Interface Critter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCritter, Enemy, Missile, Shooter

    public interface Critter
    The Critter interface defines what methods on-screen objects should have. All on-screen objects should have a position, velocity and acceleration. These are used to calculate how the object moves.
